original_text: “The Law and the Prophets were until John; since then the good news of the kingdom of God is preached, and everyone forces his way into it.
korean_text: 율법과 선지자는 요한의 때까지요 그 후부터는 하나님 나라의 복음이 전파되어 사람마다 그리로 침입하느니라

sentences.original_text: The Law and the Prophets were until John
since then the good news of the kingdom of God is preached
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후로 하나님 나라의 복음이 전파되고

sentences.original_text: and everyone forces his way into it.
